dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
phydms enables phylogenetic analyses using deep mutational scanning data
to inform the substitution models. It implements Experimentally informed
codon models (ExpCM) for phylogenetic inference and the detection of
biologically interesting selection.
dependent_to.name: py-phydms

description:
PyPDF2 is a free and open source pure-python PDF library capable of
splitting, merging, cropping, and transforming the pages of PDF files.
It can also add custom data, viewing options, and passwords to PDF
files. PyPDF2 can retrieve text and metadata from PDFs as well.
name: py-pypdf2

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
